summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Barton Street, from Deep Water in Puget Sound to Fauntleroy Avenue and from California Avenue to 30th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9846 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
